textBeforeTable: TV Schedule Listen Live 10/23/2011 Two water main breaks have forced road closures in the area. According to our news partners at the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, one of the breaks happened on Potomac Avenue in Banksville, while the other happened in Collier. 2 Water Main Breaks Force Road Closures 11/07/2013 Police are investigating an early Thursday morning home invasion in Wilkins Township.
